item.title: Privacy concerns with reCAPTCHA V3
item.description: Privacy concerns with reCAPTCHA V3 Captcha challenges are keeping bots from flooding the internet with generated stuff. They are tough but a lot less I guess. Google took over reCAPTCHA in 2009 and so far there where three released versions: V1: The one where you help google recognising house numbers from StreetView V2: Just an “I’m not a robot” checkbox (some user behaviour is tracked in the background) V3: Invisible. reCAPTCHA is permanently calculating a score of the user’s behaviour.
